values.text:
To the owner of the website under the domain {{ PLAGIATOR_DOMAIN }}.

We believe you value your work as much as we do. It has come to our attention that you have infringed our copyright protected work. This infringement consists of copied pictures owned by us.

Unfortunately, your actions unlawfully misappropriated and misuses our original and creative work deprives us of the benefits, privileges and profits from our exclusive use of our copyrighted work.

We have not authorized your use of our works for your commercial purposes and, therefore, as the copyright owner, we demand that you immediately cease and desist from using and from permitting any third party to use this work.

We are hereby demanding an explanation of this matter. Please contact the undersigned immediately at the following mail so we can resolve this matter. If we do not hear from you within ten days from the date of this letter, we will be forced to pursue further action against you.

Sincerely,


{{ CLIENT_NAME }}
{{ CLIENT_EMAIL }}
